publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4168 David Whitton: HMP Low Moss—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Prison Service on making the correct decision to keep the name of the new prison to be built at Low Moss in Bishopbriggs, HMP Low Moss; notes that it was only after a sustained campaign by Bishopbriggs’ residents that the Scottish Prison Service decided to look again at the working title, and looks forward to construction work beginning on the new facility, which will be a welcome boost to construction work in the area. Supported by: Patricia Ferguson*, Robin Harper*, Claire Baker*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Bill Wilson*, Jackie Baillie*, Mary Mulligan*, Sarah Boyack*, Sandra White*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-4168 HMP Low Moss (lodged on 18 May 2009) Elaine Murray*

S3M-4168 David Whitton: HMP Low Moss—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Prison Service on making the correct decision to keep the name of the new prison to be built at Low Moss in Bishopbriggs, HMP Low Moss; notes that it was only after a sustained campaign by Bishopbriggs’ residents that the Scottish Prison Service decided to look again at the working title, and looks forward to construction work beginning on the new facility, which will be a welcome boost to construction work in the area. Supported by: Patricia Ferguson, Robin Harper, Claire Baker, Dr Richard Simpson, Bill Wilson, Jackie Baillie, Mary Mulligan, Sarah Boyack, Sandra White, Gil Paterson, Elaine Murray, Cathie Craigie*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-4168 HMP Low Moss (lodged on 18 May 2009) Des McNulty*
S3M-4168 HMP Low Moss (lodged on 18 May 2009) Cathy Jamieson*
